Summary: been seeing ufos all over ojai valley in the foothills and deep into the mountians
divs: sighting detailssence 09 been seeing them so iv been serching sence.what i found is that they are everwear iv found there is a pattern that you look for in the brush or rock formation . by seeing a 4 finger the 5th a 1\2 half finger the same as the five fingers on the human hand. once i find that sine then it opens the door way to the demention to ther relm to were ther everywere .tomarrow i am going to be annellised with behaveral helth in ventera county. to see if im crazy or not but i know im not i know what i see is real were was i] all over the mountians of ojai,matilija canyon,hiway 33 in the mountians. lockwood valley rd 8n12 mile marker .[what was i doing at the time] iv been serching form them all the time.[why i frist notice them]digging for gold in lockwood valley in the year of 2009 been seeing them sence then ..[they teach me all the time i am always learning. i dont understand why i am the one to know them and not anyone eles i realy need help in the matter please.
